document.full_text: of all the 32 victories accumulated by winning machine novak djokovic since the start of the year, his straight sets defeat of rafa nadal in the final of the madrid masters was the most telling of all.
document.title: djokovic heads to rome with no.1 ranking in sight
lines_and_colors: of all the 32 victories accumulated by winning machine novak djokovic since the start of the year, his straight sets defeat of rafa nadal in the final of the madrid masters was the most telling of all.
